example.code:
$ipAddressType = New-Object Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancingV2.IpAddressType('ipv4') $albScheme = New-Object Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancingV2.LoadBalancerSchemeEnum('internet-facing') $elbType = New-Object Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancingV2.LoadBalancerTypeEnum('Application')
New-ELB2LoadBalancer -IpAddressType $ipAddressType -Name 'New-Test-ALB' -Scheme $albScheme -SecurityGroup 'sg-07c3414abb8811cbd' -subnet 'subnet-c37a67a6','subnet-fc02eea0' -Type $elbType -Region us-east-1
AvailabilityZones : {us-east-1b, us-east-1a} CanonicalHostedZoneId : Z35SXDOTRQ7X7K CreatedTime : 12/28/19 2:58:03 PM DNSName : New-Test-ALB-1391502222.us-east-1.elb.amazonaws.com IpAddressType : ipv4 LoadBalancerArn : arn:aws:elasticloadbalancing:us-east-1:123456789012:loadbalancer/app/New-Test-ALB/dab2e4d90eb51493 LoadBalancerName : New-Test-ALB Scheme : internet-facing SecurityGroups : {sg-07c3414abb8811cbd} State : Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancingV2.Model.LoadBalancerState Type : application VpcId : vpc-2cfd7000
example.description: This example creates new internet facing Application load balancer with two subnets.
